data.name: Trivial Quiz
data.subtitle: PLUGGY trivial quiz!
data.description: Have fun with PLUGGY and trivial quiz! Prove yourself with the most varied questions on art and culture!

trials.name: Lorenzo De’ Medici
trials.description: Lorenzo De’ Medici, called The Magnificient, was the magnate and patron of which of well known artists of his time?

quiz.question: Lorenzo De’ Medici, called The Magnificient, was the magnate and patron of which of well known artists of his time?

answer: The first man on the moon
